parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name/>=<value> Game version

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> local </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Camera Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Executes a command on the given ''camera / actor'' object. Known commands for:

{<template><title>!</title></template> class<template><title>=</title></template>"wikitable"
! All cameras !! "Camera" !! "Seagull" !! "CamCurator"
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>-
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>
* <tt>"manual on"</tt>
* <tt>"manual off"</tt>
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>
* <tt>"inertia on"</tt>
* <tt>"inertia off"</tt>
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>
* <tt>"landed"</tt> lands the seagull
* <tt>"airborne"</tt> makes the seagull fly
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>
* <tt>"maxPitch (x)"</tt> (number, in degrees)
* <tt>"minPitch (x)"</tt> (number, in degrees)
* <tt>"speedDefault (x)"</tt> (number)
* <tt>"speedMax (x)"</tt> (number)
* <tt>"ceilingHeight (x)"</tt> (number, in meters)
* <tt>"atl (x)"</tt> (on/off)
* <tt>"surfaceSpeed (x)"</tt> (on/off)
<template lineStart="1"><title>!</title></template>}

<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> The [[camCommand]] effect is immediate and does not need [[camCommit]]/[[camCommitPrepared]].</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> camera [[camCommand]] command </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> camera: [[Object]] - see [[camCreate]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> command: [[String]] - see description </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_camera [[camCommand]] "manual on";</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>[[private]] _camera = "CamCurator" [[camCreate]] [0,0,0];
_camera [[camCommand]] "maxPitch 89";
_camera [[camCommand]] "minPitch -89";
_camera [[camCommand]] "speedDefault 0.1";
_camera [[camCommand]] "speedMax 2";
_camera [[camCommand]] "ceilingHeight 5000";
_camera [[camCommand]] "atl off";
_camera [[camCommand]] "surfaceSpeed off";
</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[cameraEffect]], [[camCreate]], [[camCommit]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
